name: FlyBee
description:
Bees have been declared the most important living beings on planet Earth by the Earthwatch Institute.

70% of the agricultural sector worldwide relies on bees and they generate $30 billion in crops annually.

We have developed this game in order to raise awareness amongst people about the  dangers that the bee population is facing at the moment and to increase their interest and general knowledge about the subject

All the money donated to this game will be redirected towards the cause it supports!
